characterDescription:
Torol is a lighteyed Alethi young man from Highprince Aladar's warcamp on the Shattered Plains. He is a friend to Adolin Kholin.
Torol is accompanied by Eshava on an afternoon when Adolin meets with Jakamav, and a group of other young lighteyes at an Outer Market wineshop. This group included Danlan as well.

characterDetails.Personality: Torol is a keen fellow, known for his refined sense of taste. Adolin always wanted him along when sampling wines.
